title: Tree-of-Thought Prompting: Key Techniques and Use Cases
title1: Tree-of-Thought Prompting: Key Techniques and Use Cases
title2: Tree-of-Thought Prompting: Key Techniques and Use Cases
description: Learn about Tree-of-Thought (ToT) prompting techniques, how it works and how it compares with other prompting techniques like Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
author: Lina Lam
